EmailTemplate.subject: Time to Pick Up the Pace: Continuously Delivered Security
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Our mission is to enable partners to build deep expertise and thriving business practices with Pivotal.
Continuously Delivered Security
If you think continuous delivery is only for software, think again. With threats coming fast and furious, it’s essential to apply continuously delivered security to enterprise systems and data to stay one step ahead of bad actors. This month, learn how Pivotal helps customers use automation and frequent updates to keep applications and data safe at scale.
Blog
- Find out how just two operators deployed over 70 stemcell patches <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/how-two-operators-are-continuously-patching-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]> in less than five months and how you can, too.
Webinar
- Learn how to maintain a top-notch security posture <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/feb-20-cloud-native-security-processes-and-tools-for-real-world-transformation-webinar]]> while simultaneously supporting developer self-service across thousands of workloads.
Analyst Report
- Yes, your organization can reduce risk and improve security through infrastructure automation. But don’t take our word for it. Read this report by Forrester Research <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/reduce-risk-and-improve-security-through-infrastructure-automation]]>.
You can find more great podcasts, blog posts, and webinars in the recently refreshed Pivotal Content Library <[[https://pivotal.io/content-library]]>.
UPCOMING WEBINARS - Application Transformation Partner Attach and Pivotal Certifications Join Danny Zaidifard, General Manager of Strategic Alliances at Pivotal, as he covers the importance of partner-provided application transformation services and Pivotal certifications to the success of Pivotal, our partners and our customers.
Register here <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/webinars-events.aspx]]> Date: March 13, 2019 Time: 1PM ET / 10AM PAC
Enablement
From in-person classes to blogs to webinars, Pivotal offers a broad set of enablement resources for you to choose from.
Partner Platform Architect Spotlight
- Microservices are not the destination <[[https://content.pivotal.io/intersect/microservices-are-not-your-destination]]>. Key insights from Kenny Bastani in his time working with customers on their journey to using microservices.
- Local Development with Eureka, Zuul, and Cloud Configuration <[[http://engineering.pivotal.io/post/local-eureka-zuul-cloud_config-with-spring/]]>. Brandon Stokes explains how to set up the Spring Cloud Netflix stack to prototype for local development and shares an example of a common use case.
Public Webinars
- Mar 21: Tools and Recipes to Replatform Monolithic Apps to Modern Cloud Environments <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/mar-21-tools-and-recipes-to-replatform-monolithic-apps-to-modern-cloud-environments-webinar?utm_source=get-news&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=step-by-step-dtx-ibm&utm_term=q119]]>
- Mar 28: Reimagining Postgres in a Modern Application Setting <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/mar-28-reimagining-postgres-in-a-modern-application-setting-webinar?utm_source=get-news&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=reimagine-postgres&utm_term=q119]]>
- Apr 11: Six Things You Need to Know to Safely Run Kubernetes <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/apr-11-6-things-you-need-to-know-to-safely-run-kubernetes-webinar?utm_source=get-news&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=6-thing-kubernetes&utm_term=q119]]>
View all upcoming webinars here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars]]>.
Partner Portal
- The February Global Ecosystem webinar featured Pivotal Certifications. Watch the replay and check out slides <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/Global/more/recordings.aspx]]> on the Partner Portal.
Greenplum Spotlight
- Reminder: PostgresConf NYC and Greenplum Summit are this March 17 to 22. Check out this highlight blog <[[https://postgresconf.org/blog/posts/pivotal-greenplum-and-postgresconf]]> to learn why you can’t afford to miss this data-driven event!.
- Greenplum and data science go together like Rogers and Astaire. Learn how Greenplum optimizes complex queries <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=308TI5vpqLM]]> and find out how Greenplum can help you with deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uG110mk5b6c]]>.
The Partner Portal Data Page <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/Global/delivery/working-with-data.aspx]]> has the latest Greenplum release details, demonstration ideas, and information from a few of our data partners.
Platform Acceleration Lab
- Apr 1: Java Application Architect (3 week) in Singapore - Apr 15: Java Application Architect (3 week) in Boulder - Apr 15: Java Application Architect (3 week) in London - Apr 29: Java Application Architect (3 week) in Shanghai - May 13: .NET for Developers (1 week) in Boulder - Jun 10: Java for Developers (1 week) in Boulder
Have PAL questions? You can find more information here <[[https://pivotal.io/platform-acceleration-lab]]>, or reach out to your Pivotal Alliances Manager.
Marketing
Last month, we talked about the importance of partner pages on pivotal.io/partners <[[https://pivotal.io/partners]]> and how to make yours stand out. This month we’re highlighting one of the best opportunities of the year to share your message directly with thousands of developers, operators, and business leaders: SpringOne Platform 2019!
Upcoming Events
- Mar - Dec: SpringOne Tour <[[https://springonetour.io/]]> is coming to a city near you!
- April 2-4, 2019: Cloud Foundry Summit North America <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event/nasummit2019/]]> is coming to Philadelphia
- Oct 7-10, 2019: Start planning now for SpringOne Platform 2019 in Austin, TX! Please contact us at sponsorS1P@pivotal.io <[[mailto:sponsorS1P@pivotal.io]]> about 2019 sponsorship opportunities!
MARKETING BEST PRACTICE OF THE MONTH - Take the Stage at SpringOne Platform 2019! <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2019/cfp]]>
We want you, Pivotal partners, to share your wisdom on the main stage or in a break out session at SpringOne Platform 2019, the premier conference for getting hands-on with modern software. The conference, taking place in Austin in October, is one of the best opportunities of the year for you to get in front of thousands of potential customers, from developers and operators to business unit and executive leaders!
But the number of sessions is limited and competition is fierce. How do you set your submission apart from the rest? Bring one of your customers on stage with you! SpringOne Platform attendees want to hear about real-world experiences and lessons learned, so joint submissions that include a customer presenter have the best chance of being selected.
SpringOne Platform 2019 Call for Papers <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2019/cfp]]> is open now and ends on April 12, so don’t wait. Corral one of your top customers, write a great session description, and submit it today <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2019/cfp]]>!
Partner Spotlight:
Systems Integrator // North America // Pivotal Cloud Foundry
Perficient partners with Pivotal to help our joint customers evolve application development and drive digital transformation. With over 25 successful cloud migration projects through the optimized combination of infrastructure, applications, storage, data, analytics, collaboration, and messaging, our team of PAL-certified experts works with customers across multiple industries such as automotive, financial services, industrial, media, retail, government, technology, and telecommunications. Perficient received Pivotal’s 2018 Systems Integrator Partner of the Year Award for Customer Impact.
Getting the Joint Story Out:
- Find out why Perficient is placing big bets on its partnership with Pivotal <[[https://blogs.perficient.com/2018/10/30/placing-big-bets-on-pivotal/]]>. - Watch and listen to Perficient’s Joel Thimsen present on why your digital transformation strategy demands middleware modernization <[[https://content.pivotal.io/slides/why-your-digital-transformation-strategy-demands-middleware-modernization]]>.
Find more content from Perficient about working with Pivotal here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/perficient]]>. “Speed to market and improved customer experience are increasingly important aspects of our clients’ digital transformation strategies for 2019 and beyond. With Pivotal, we help revolutionize application development, enabling clients to innovate quickly and dominate their industries. Pivotal’s software is a vital part of Perficient’s overall digital transformation services, which includes cloud strategy, application modernization, and cloud-native development as well as process management and DevOps.” – Tom Hogan, COO at Perficient
